Definition: Indicates the date of an event or record. Many dates have no associated events, as this table is created as a timeline table, making it easier to plot on a time series.
Indicates the vehicle that is incurring an event in the flight plan
Indicates the docking/berthing location at which a vehicle will attach to ISS
Indicates the category of vehicle of a given record
Indicates the name of an EVA event, if applicable on a given date
Indicates whether an EVA is planned, estimated, or actual (has already occurred)
Indicates event type (EVA, Vehicle Dock, Vehicle Landing, etc.)
